quote: Friends don't lie.
context: One of Eleven's first learned principles about friendship

quote: Mornings are for coffee and contemplation.
context: Hopper's trademark morning philosophy

quote: She's our friend and she's crazy!
context: Defending Eleven while also acknowledging her unpredictable powers

quote: Mouth-breather.
context: Eleven's go-to insult learned from Mike

quote: You can't spell America without Erica.
context: Erica making her patriotic entrance

quote: Ahoy ladies! Would you guys like to set sail on this ocean of flavor with me?
context: Steve's awkward Scoops Ahoy uniform greeting

quote: I dump your ass.
context: Eleven breaking up with Mike after learning from Max

quote: The gate. I opened it. I'm the monster.
context: Eleven blaming herself for opening the gate to the Upside Down

quote: How many children are you friends with?
context: Robin questioning Steve's unusual friend group

quote: I'm the one who gave you a life!
context: Hopper arguing with Eleven about keeping her hidden

quote: This is music!
context: Eddie before his epic guitar solo in the Upside Down

quote: Never change, Dustin Henderson.
context: Eddie's final words to his friend

quote: I didn't run away this time, right?
context: Eddie's last words after sacrificing himself

quote: Keep the door open three inches!
context: Hopper's protective house rule for Eleven

quote: Four puffs of the Farrah Fawcett spray.
context: Steve sharing his hair care secrets with Dustin

quote: Try before you deny, brochachos!
context: Argyle promoting pineapple pizza

quote: Turn around, look at what you see... In her face, the mirror of your dreams...
context: The NeverEnding Story duet during the Battle of Starcourt

quote: Easy peasy!
context: Bob's optimistic catchphrase before his sacrifice

quote: I will never stop looking for him!
context: Joyce's determination to find Will

quote: I say yes!
context: Hopper agreeing to adopt Eleven

quote: It's like I'm stuck. Stuck in the Upside Down.
context: Will describing his ongoing connection to the Upside Down

quote: What happened to Barb?
context: Nancy's guilt-driven quest for justice for her friend

quote: You're the most incredible person in the world.
context: Mike confessing his feelings to Eleven

quote: I am the reason for everything that's happened.
context: Vecna revealing he is the true evil behind all Upside Down attacks

quote: Running up that hill...
context: Max escaping Vecna's curse with Kate Bush's song

quote: Excellent!
context: Brenner's unsettling approval of Eleven's powers

quote: Chrissy, wake up! I don't like this!
context: Eddie's panicked plea when Chrissy is taken over by Vecna

quote: Something's coming. Something hungry for blood.
context: Lucas during the opening D&D campaign foreshadowing the Demogorgon

quote: Call me a conspiracist, I call myself a realist!
context: Murray defending his conspiracy theories

quote: Woody Woodpecker!
context: Alexei's joyful reaction to winning a stuffed animal

quote: Just be careful of the Demogorgon.
context: Dustin's warning during D&D, unaware of the real danger

quote: You should never have looked for me. Because now I see you. Now we can finally end this.
context: Vecna threatening Eleven

quote: I'm ten, chill!
context: Erica responding to Steve's concerns

quote: We're Max and Eleven. Super best friends.
context: Max bonding with Eleven

quote: Pretty... good.
context: Eleven learning to express herself

quote: Goodbye, Mike.
context: Eleven before sacrificing herself to defeat the Demogorgon

quote: I'll never let anything bad happen to you again.
context: Mike's promise to Eleven at the Snow Ball

quote: Do you really think I'm crazy?
context: Joyce seeking validation about the supernatural occurrences

quote: His name is D'Artagnan. Dart for short.
context: Dustin naming his 'pet' pollywog

quote: I made you.
context: Brenner's dark claim of ownership over Eleven

quote: You've come so far. I'm so proud of you.
context: Brenner's final words to Eleven

quote: I saw it. The thing that took me.
context: Billy breaking free from the Mind Flayer's control

quote: Code Red!
context: Emergency signal for the group

quote: Planck's constant!
context: Suzie providing the numeric code to close the gate

quote: This pain... it is a gift.
context: Vecna speaking to Max about trauma and pain

quote: Never Tell Me The Odds!
context: Dustin quoting Han Solo

quote: I'm not afraid of you. I'm not afraid of anything anymore.
context: Max confronting Vecna

quote: Purple Palm Tree Delight.
context: Argyle's name for his special marijuana strain

quote: I am Dungeon Master!
context: Eddie's commanding presence in Hellfire Club

quote: Breathe... Sunflower... Three to the right, four to the left... Rainbow... 450...
context: Terry's cryptic message about her memories of Eleven
